name: ★ Fallalypse ★ Death or Cress ♝
description: The communication with SH42 looking for new planets suitable for life was lost. The last message sent from it said: "Death or Cress". A space-marine and a priest of the newly-formed Space Battle Church set out on a search of the survived or to read the funeral service for the remains of the dead.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x64) Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Default
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (x64) Processor: 2GHz Quad Core Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 950 or higher with 2GB Memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Default
